_header: It is doubt in mans richesse
_description: The problem of wealth — one couplet translating ‘Cum quis positus in prosperitate diligitur, incertum valde est vtrum possessor vel prosperitas diligatur’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
It is doute in mannis richesseWer mo louen his godis or is
                    worþinesse
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 15.
